remarks:
A mixed syllogism inference from an implication and a biconditional. Useful for substituting a consequent with a definition.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 16-Dec-2013.)

 A mixed syllogism inference from an implication and a biconditional. Useful for substituting an consequent with a definition.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 16-Dec-2013.)
statement:
sylnibr.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. ps ) $.
sylnibr.2 $e |- ( ch <-> ps ) $.
sylnibr $p |- ( ph -> -. ch ) $.
